amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exemption for communications pertaining to the Second Amendment of the Constitution.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 27 printed in the Congressional Record of February 12, 2002 to exempt from the bill any communication/advertiseme t that consists of information or commentary about a person holding or seeking federal office on any matter pertaining to the Second Amendment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pickering amendment Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 219 (Roll no. 24).
